title: The Next Pixel with a stylus, Pleaseee
content:
Hopefully, this is the right place to post, just doing what the google support told me to,

Just wanted to provide a suggestion for a future google pixel phone, 

I have been a Fan of Google phone for some time now, I had one of the Nexus phones but then switched over to the Samsung Note series as the stylus is one of the biggest features I use.

I would love for the next google pixel phone to be able to have an embedded stylus like the Samsung Note 9 does which is what I am using now and what I choose over the Pixel 3XL because of this one feature.

Would like to hear back from someone at Google to see if this is in there future plan so I can know if I should keep getting Samsung Phone of wait until the next Pixel has a stylus.
